  @/@snapToUnits
  sname
  snapToUnits
  sinputtype
  select
  sgroup
  NumericAxis
  sreadOnly
  false
  sinheritDescription
  false
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<table cellspacing="0" class="member-table">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<div class="mdesc">
			<div class="long">If true, the labels, ticks, gridlines, and other objects will snap to the nearest major or minor unit. If false, their position will be based on the minimum value.</div>
			</div>
			</td>
			<td>NumericAxis</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
#$@text#$@
  svalidateAllowBlank

  LallowDecimals

  sth_createIndex

  snapToUnits
